original_title: Dani Pedrosa: el silencio del samurái
overview: A personal review of Dani Pedrosa's unique motorcycling career is seen through the eyes of his family, rivals and friends. At the same time, Pedrosa has now collaborated with legendary Deus design director Mike Woolaway to build a custom café racer with a 750cc two-stroke Honda engine.
title: Dani Pedrosa: The Silent Samurai
